# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    line_length = 0
    wrapped_text = ""
    for word in words
        if line_length + length(word) > text_width
            wrapped_text *= "\n"
            line_length = 0
        end
        wrapped_text *= word * " "
        line_length += length(word) + 1
    end
    return wrapped_text
end

# Example
text = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit."
result = wrap_string(text, text_width=20)
println(result)
```
